import React from 'react'; import { Shield, AlertTriangle, CheckCircle, XCircle, TrendingUp, FileText } from 'lucide-react'; import { DashboardStats, RiskScore } from '../types'; interface RBIComplianceDashboardProps { stats: DashboardStats; scores: RiskScore[]; } const RBIComplianceDashboard: React.FC = ({ stats, scores }) => { const complianceRate = stats.rbi_compliance_rate; const avgLoanAmount = stats.avg_loan_amount; // Calculate additional metrics const highEMIRatioCount = scores.filter(s => s.emi_to_income_ratio > 50).length; const avgEMIRatio = scores.reduce((sum, s) => sum + s.emi_to_income_ratio, 0) / scores.length; const getComplianceColor = (rate: number) => { if (rate >= 80) return 'text-green-600 bg-green-50 border-green-200'; if (rate >= 60) return 'text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-50 border-yellow-200'; return 'text-red-600 bg-red-50 border-red-200'; }; const getComplianceIcon = (rate: number) => { if (rate >= 80) return ; if (rate >= 60) return ; return ; }; return (
{/* RBI Compliance Header */}

RBI Compliance Dashboard

{getComplianceIcon(complianceRate)} {complianceRate.toFixed(1)}% Compliant

Total Applications

{stats.total_users}

RBI Compliant

{stats.total_compliant_users}

Avg Loan Amount

₹{(avgLoanAmount/1000).toFixed(0)}K

Avg EMI Ratio

{avgEMIRatio.toFixed(1)}%

{/* RBI Guidelines Summary */}

RBI Microfinance Guidelines

Loan Limits

  • • Max loan: ₹1.25 Lakh
  • • Max total debt: ₹1 Lakh
  • • Min income: ₹5,000/month

Interest & Tenure

  • • Max interest: 26% per annum
  • • Min tenure: 24 months (>₹15K)
  • • EMI-to-income: ≤50%

Lending Practices

  • • Collateral-free lending
  • • Productive purposes preferred
  • • Group lending encouraged
{/* Common Violations */} {stats.common_violations.length > 0 && (

Common RBI Violations

{stats.common_violations.map((violation, index) => (
{violation.violation}
{violation.count} cases
))}
)} {/* Risk Distribution with RBI Context */}

Risk Distribution & RBI Impact

{stats.low_risk_count}

Low Risk

RBI Compliant & Approved

{stats.medium_risk_count}

Medium Risk

Needs Review

{stats.high_risk_count}

High Risk

RBI Non-Compliant

{/* EMI Analysis */}

EMI-to-Income Analysis

Average EMI Ratio {avgEMIRatio.toFixed(1)}%
50 ? 'bg-red-500' : avgEMIRatio > 40 ? 'bg-yellow-500' : 'bg-green-500'}`} style={{ width: `${Math.min(avgEMIRatio, 100)}%` }} >

RBI Guideline: ≤50%

High EMI Ratio Cases {highEMIRatioCount}
{highEMIRatioCount > 0 ? `${((highEMIRatioCount / stats.total_users) * 100).toFixed(1)}% of applications exceed 50% EMI ratio` : 'All applications within RBI EMI guidelines' }
); }; export default RBIComplianceDashboard;
